summary: In Greek mythology, the Minotaur is a scary creature with a bull's head and a man's body. It lived in a maze called the Labyrinth on the island of Crete. King Minos forced the people of Athens to send young people as sacrifices to the Minotaur every nine years. Theseus, a brave hero, killed the Minotaur with help from King Minos' daughter, Ariadne. She gave him a thread to find his way out of the maze.
title: Minotaur
